name: Komayō page
description: In the mystical light of the full moon, discover the story of Komayō, a bewitching yōkai from Japanese folklore. Seductive and deadly, she lures lost souls into the game of ōgi, absorbing their life energy and dooming them to eternal torment. It's a tale of fatal attraction and unchecked desire, a poignant warning against the dangers of temptation.
